post.description: Send password reset email to the user
Reset the user's password using a token from email

Allows an **authenticated user** to request changing their email address.   The system will send a confirmation link to the **current (old)** email address.   This link contains a token of type `reset-email` used to confirm the change.

200.description: Confirmation email was successfully sent to your current address!

message.example: Confirmation email was successfully sent to your current address!

post.description: Accepts a token from the email and a new address. Validates a token of type `reset-email` and updates the user's email in the database.

get.description:
Retrieves user information and a paginated list of their favorite stories.
Requires pagination query parameters (page, perPage) for the favorites list.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for the favorites list.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of favorite stories per page.

favorites.description: Array of favorited story objects with populated owner data.
